column1: The 1st and 2nd questions of law are as follows:
Q1. Did the Court of Appeal err in law in shifting the burden of proof from the
tax  payer  to  the  revenue  in  respect  of  matters  that  are  within  the  specific
knowledge of the taxpayer and/or relating to a tax exemption?
Q2. Did the Court of Appeal err in law in departing from the principle that in a
case of an ambiguity or doubt regarding an exemption in a fiscal statute, such
ambiguity or doubt should be resolved in favour of the revenue and not the
